note: Naomi Latini Wolfe is an award-winning educator and author. She holds a Master's degree in Sociology and has over 15 years of experience teaching at the college level. As a professor, Naomi is passionate about empowering students through compassionate lessons on diversity, sustainability and technology. She received a Distinguished Online Teaching Award for her work promoting respectful discourse. In addition to teaching, Naomi devotes her time to researching issues affecting society.
